name: Vyalikaval
description: The branch at Vyalikaval is the mother center of GGSS. GGSS was established in Vyalikaval, and this branch is personally supervised by our Guru Maata.
head: Lakshman
venue: Vyalikaval Education Society, Behind Chowdiah Memorial Hall, Vyalikaval, Bangalore - 560003.

name: Siddhashrama Malleshwaram
description: The branch at Malleshwaram is headed by Smt. Prema, trained by Smt. Ananthalakshmi Natarajan. Classes have been held for over five years at Siddhashrama, training more than twenty-five children and women in Bhagavadgita, shlokas, stotras, Soundaryalahari, Shivanandalahari and bhajans.
head: Smt. Prema

name: Vijayanagar
description: The branch at Vijayanagar is the first sub-branch of GGSS established by Sri. T R Panchukrishnan.
head: Smt. Satyabama
venue: Blue Bell Public School, 1st Main Road, Anubhava Nagar, Nagarbhavi, near Canara Bank Colony Park, Bangalore 560072.

name: SRGGSS Basaveshvaranagar
description: The branch at Basaveshvaranagar is well known as Sita Rama Sangha. Slokas and stotras are taught to people of all age groups for the past 25 years.
head: Smt. Srividya
venue: No.86, Gruhalakshmi Layout, Krishna Road, 1st Stage, Basaveshvaranagar, Bangalore - 560079.
timings: Monday to Friday, 6.00 PM to 7.00 PM
